name: Archon Of Redemption
resist: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
text: The archon's weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
text: The archon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: One Being
text: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The "rider" can't be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon's being short of its death.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: detect evil and good

action.name: Multiattack
text: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

action.name: Sword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

spells: detect evil and good, destructive wave, geas
